# Optimizer

- Suggestions: generated by heuristic + optional AI-assisted analyzers over metrics/traces/memory.
- Storage: SQLite-backed `OptimizerStorage`; overlays persisted via `OverlayStore`.
- Application: `SuggestionApplier` updates overlays (models/flows/prompts/tools/memory policies) and marks suggestions applied/rejected.
- Modes: manual by default; auto-apply for safe actions can be enabled via secrets/config.

Interfaces:
- CLI: `n3 optimize scan|list|apply|reject|overlays`
- HTTP: `/api/optimizer/suggestions`, `/scan`, `/apply/{id}`, `/reject/{id}`, `/overlays`
- Studio: Optimizer panel (list/apply/reject/scan).
